src:
Ketika Pep Guardiola Mengagumi Skuat Manchester United
05 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Josep Guardiola. Manajer Manchester City itu mengaku punya kekaguman mendalam terhadap skuat Manchester United di tahun 2009 silam.
10 tahun yang lalu, Guardiola pernah menantang Manchester United di Final Liga Champions. Pada saat itu ia masih menukangi klub raksasa Spanyol, Barcelona.
Manchester United yang berstatus sebagai juara bertahan Liga Champions berhasrat besar untuk mempertahankan gelar juara mereka. Namun pada saat itu, Pep bersama Barcelona sukses memenangkan final di Roma itu berkat gol Samule Eto'o dan Lionel Messi.
Meski memenangkan laga itu, Pep mengaku sangat mengagumi kualitas yang dimiliki skuat Setan Merah. "Skuat Manchester United yang itu [2009] benar luar biasa," beber Pep kepada BT Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap manajer asal Spanyol itu di bawah ini.
text:
When Pep Guardiola Admires Manchester United's squad
05 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A confession was made by Josep Guardiola. The Manchester City manager claimed he had deep admiration for the Manchester United squad in 2009.
10 years ago, Guardiola had challenged Manchester United in the Champions League Final. At that time he still coached the Spanish giant club, Barcelona.
Manchester United, who are the defending Champions League champions, have a great desire to defend their title. But at that time, Pep with Barcelona successfully won the final in Rome thanks to goals from Samule Eto'o and Lionel Messi.
Despite winning the match, Pep claimed to admire the quality possessed by the Red Devils squad. "The Manchester United squad [2009] is truly extraordinary," Pep told BT Sports.

Read the full comments of the Spanish manager below.
